metadata.name: Potential Arbitrary DLL Load Using Winword
metadata.comment: Detects potential DLL sideloading using the Microsoft Office winword process via the '/l' flag.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\winword.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('winword.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/l ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll')))

output.summary: Detects potential DLL sideloading using the Microsoft Office winword process via the '/l' flag.
